MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG13 postcode area of Langholm. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.01AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 10.27AM on 31 October 2020.
